snippet: Citing overseas travel plans, Vice President Biden will not be in Washington next month for the Israeli prime minister’s address, adding to the tension between the two administrations.
abstract: Vice Pres Joseph R Biden Jr escalates tense situation by announcing that he will not be present when Israeli Prime Min Benjamin Netanyahu addresses Congress; cites unspecified overseas travel plans.

byline.contributor: Jodi Rudoren contributed reporting from Jerusalem.

lead_paragraph: Citing overseas travel plans, Vice President Biden will not be in Washington next month for the Israeli prime minister’s address, adding to the tension between the two administrations.

headline.seo: Vice President Biden Won’t Attend Netanyahu’s Address to U.S. Congress
headline.main: Citing Overseas Travel Plans, Biden Won’t Attend Netanyahu’s Speech to Congress
headline.print_headline: Citing Overseas Travel Plans, Biden Won’t Attend Netanyahu’s Speech to Congress
